statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ShipmentID , AA.OrderItemID , AA.ShippedQty
FROM dbo.TShipmentItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ShipmentID = #ShipmentID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TShipmentItem AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TOrder ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ShipmentID, OrderItemID, ShippedQty ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ShipmentID#, #OrderItemID#, #ShippedQty# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TShipmentItem SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ShipmentID = #ShipmentID# , OrderItemID = #OrderItemID# , ShippedQty = #ShippedQty# WHERE ID = #ID#
